name: Archie the Arachnid
description:
Archie the Arachnid is an in-development demonstration of an advanced character controller. As Archie, you can climb, swing and ragdoll around the place.

Controls:

WASD/Left Stick - Move

Space/South Gamepad Button - Jump

Mouse/Right Stick - Look

LMB/Right Gamepad Trigger - Shoot web

RMB/Left Gamepad Trigger - Aim

Q/North Gamepad Button - Get Up
